column2: send me a message in case sports youtube channels change and i am not at here
column3: edge ( monitor ( @com.youtube.channels_by_category param:category_id:Enum(best_of_youtube,recommended,paid,music,comedy,film_and_entertainment,gaming,beauty_and_fashion,from_tv,automotive,animation,sports,diy,tech,science,cooking,causes,news_and_politics,lifestyle) = enum:sports ) ) on @org.thingpedia.builtin.thingengine.builtin.get_gps { not param:location:Location == location:current_location } => notify

column2: inform me any time the direct messages i received on twitter change and my location is not work
column3: edge ( monitor ( @com.twitter.direct_messages ) ) on @org.thingpedia.builtin.thingengine.builtin.get_gps { not param:location:Location == location:work } => notify

column2: when hacker news front page updates get stories on macrumors
when slashdot news updates tell me what 's on right now
anyone is allowed to enable nba news if my location is not home
column3: policy true : now => @org.thingpedia.builtin.thingengine.builtin.configure filter @org.thingpedia.builtin.thingengine.builtin.get_gps { not param:location:Location == location:home } and param:device:Entity(tt:device) == device:com.nba

column2: setup cryptonator when techcrunch news updates
get sticky notes when ars technica publishes a new article
alert me when it is more humid than 1 in where i am now saying QUOTED_STRING_0
column3: monitor ( ( @org.thingpedia.weather.current param:location:Location = location:current_location ) filter param:humidity:Number >= 1 ) => @org.thingpedia.builtin.thingengine.builtin.say param:message:String = QUOTED_STRING_0

column2: USERNAME_0 has my permission to setup tumblr blog if my location is not here
column3: policy param:source:Entity(tt:contact) == USERNAME_0 : now => @org.thingpedia.builtin.thingengine.builtin.configure filter @org.thingpedia.builtin.thingengine.builtin.get_gps { not param:location:Location == location:current_location } and param:device:Entity(tt:device) == device:com.tumblr.blog

column2: if something happens on my security camera retrieve what philips hue can do
setup thingengine when a file is modified on google drive
notify me should photos in album QUOTED_STRING_0 on facebook change and after TIME_0
column3: edge ( monitor ( @com.facebook.list_photos param:album:String = QUOTED_STRING_0 ) ) on @org.thingpedia.builtin.thingengine.builtin.get_time { param:time:Date >= TIME_0 } => notify
